## ‚úÖ PLANNING SESSION COMPLETE

I've successfully completed the planning phase for **Spec 012: Codex PR Fix #2**. Here's what was created:

### üìã Created Files

1. **implementation_plan.json** (10KB)
   - Workflow type: **Investigation**
   - 4 phases, 11 subtasks
   - Sequential execution (no parallelism due to dependencies)

2. **project_index.json** (704B)
   - Project type: Single service
   - Tech stack: React 19.2.0, TypeScript 5.9.3, Vite 7.2.4, Tailwind CSS 4.1.18, ESLint 9
   - Development port: 5173

3. **context.json** (1.1KB)
   - Investigation requirements: PR #4, review ID 3633255069, commit 563ece1fbd
   - GitHub CLI patterns documented
   - Relevant configuration files identified

4. **init.sh** (2.3KB, executable)
   - Validates GitHub CLI authentication
   - Optional development server startup
   - Provides investigation command examples

5. **build-progress.txt** (2.2KB)
   - Complete session summary
   - Startup command documented

### üìä Implementation Plan Summary

**Workflow**: Investigation (not standard bug fix)

**Phase Breakdown**:

| Phase | Name | Type | Subtasks | Key Actions |
|-------|------|------|----------|-------------|
| 1 | Reproduce and Fetch Review Data | investigation | 4 | Authenticate GitHub CLI, fetch PR #4, retrieve review comments |
| 2 | Analyze Review and Determine Actionability | investigation | 2 | Document findings, update Issue #5 |
| 3 | Implement Fixes | implementation | 3 | **CONDITIONAL** - Only if actionable issues found |
| 4 | Verification and Issue Resolution | cleanup | 2 | Browser verification, final issue update |

**Critical Insight**: Phase 2 outputs a determination (actionable vs. invalid). Phase 3 is **BLOCKED** until Phase 2 completes with a finding of actionable issues.

### üéØ Verification Strategy

- **Risk Level**: Low
- **Test Types**: Unit tests (only if code changes are made)
- **Security Scanning**: Not required
- **Browser Verification**: Required at http://localhost:5173

### ‚ö° Parallelism Analysis

- **Max Parallel Phases**: 1 (sequential workflow)
- **Recommended Workers**: 1
- **Reasoning**: Investigation phases have strict dependencies - cannot proceed to analysis until data is fetched, cannot implement fixes until actionability is determined.

### üöÄ Next Steps

To start implementation, run:

```bash
source auto-claude/.venv/bin/activate && python auto-claude/run.py --spec 012 --parallel 1
```

The coder agent will:
1. Authenticate GitHub CLI
2. Fetch PR #4 review data from GitHub API
3. Analyze Codex review comments
4. Document findings in INVESTIGATION.md
5. Update Issue #5 with determination
6. **IF** actionable issues exist: Implement fixes, verify linting/build
7. **IF** invalid: Close issue with documentation

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notes

- **No code implementation in this session** - planning only
- Files are **gitignored** - managed locally by orchestrator
- Investigation-first approach ensures we don't implement until we understand the actual problem
- GitHub CLI must be authenticated before coder agent can proceed

---

**Planning session ended. Ready for implementation phase.**
I'll help you complete this subtask. Let me start by checking the GitHub CLI authentication status.

entries.detail:
name:	AmbitiousRealism2025/punchline-x
description:	AI-powered post optimization for X. Score before you post.
--
# Punchline X

AI-powered post optimization for X. **Score before you post.**

[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/github/license/AmbitiousRealism2025/punchline-x)](https://github.com/AmbitiousRealism2025/punchline-x)

---

## What is Punchline X?

A lightweight tool that scores your posts against X's algorithm factors before you hit publish. Get real-time feedback, AI-generated hooks, and data-driven suggestions to maximize your reach.

**Core features:**
- Real-time scoring engine (7 factors, <100ms)
- 15 proven tweet templates with fill-in-the-blank editor
- AI hook generation (ZAI GLM 4.7)
- Analytics dashboard with history tracking
- Command palette (‚åòK) and keyboard shortcuts
- Dark Raycast-style theme

---

## Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repo
git clone https://github.com/AmbitiousRealism2025/punchline-x.git
cd punchline-x/app

# Install dependencies
bun install

# Set up environment (ZAI API key)
echo "ZAI_API_KEY=your-key-here" > .env.local

# Start dev server (port 5173)
bun run dev

# Start AI proxy (port 3001) - separate terminal
bun src/server/ai-proxy.ts
```

Open http://localhost:5173

---

## Project Structure

```
punchline-x/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ app/                        # The application
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ src/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/         # React components
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lib/                # Scoring engine, templates, store
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ hooks/              # Custom React hooks
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ server/             # Bun AI proxy
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ README.md               # App-specific docs
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ feature-enhancements.md     # AI feature roadmap (15 features)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ naming-options.md           # Brand naming research
‚îÇ
‚îÇ   # Original planning docs (reference)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Scoring_System_Spec.md      # Scoring algorithm specification
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Content_Templates.md        # Tweet template library
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Tweet_Strategy_Guide.md     # X algorithm strategy guide
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ App_Master_Plan.md          # Product specification
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Quick_Reference_Card.md     # Cheat sheet
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ AGENTS.md                   # AI agent configuration
```

---

## Tech Stack

| Layer | Technology |
|-------|------------|
| Runtime | Bun |
| Build | Vite 7 |
| Frontend | React 19 + TypeScript |
| Styling | Tailwind CSS v4 |
| UI | shadcn/ui (New York, dark) |
| State | TinyBase + localStorage |
| AI | ZAI GLM 4.7 |

---

## Scoring Algorithm

Posts start at base 40, modified by:

| Factor | Range | Notes |
|--------|-------|-------|
| Media | +15 to +40 | Video best, images good |
| Hook strength | -5 to +25 | Pattern interrupts, questions, numbers |
| Engagement signals | -15 to +25 | CTAs, questions, debate invitations |
| Timing | -10 to +20 | Peak hours 8-11am PST |
| Account status | 0 to +30 | Premium + Verified bonuses |
| Content quality | -10 to +15 | Length, formatting, hashtags |
| Link penalty | -20 to -50 | Links hurt without Premium |

**Score thresholds:**
- 85+ = Excellent (post with confidence)
- 70-84 = Good (should perform well)
- 55-69 = Fair (consider improvements)
- 40-54 = Poor (rework needed)
- <40 = Critical (do not post)

---

## Keyboard Shortcuts

| Shortcut | Action |
|----------|--------|
| `‚åòK` | Open command palette |
| `‚åò1` | Go to Compose tab |
| `‚åò2` | Go to Templates tab |
| `‚åò3` | Go to Analytics tab |
| `‚åòN` | New post (clear input) |
| `‚åòEnter` | Copy to clipboard |

---

## Roadmap

See [`feature-enhancements.md`](./feature-enhancements.md) for the full AI feature roadmap, including:

- Deep Hook Analysis (psychological breakdown)
- Intelligent Rewriter (AI rewrites with explanations)
- Thread Architect (AI-planned thread structure)
- Viral Anatomy Explainer (learn from viral posts)
- A/B Variant Generator
- And 10 more...

---

## Development

```bash
cd app

# Dev server
bun run dev

# Type check
bun run tsc --noEmit

# Build
bun run build

# Add shadcn component
bun x shadcn@latest add [component]
```

---

## License

MIT

---

## Acknowledgments

Based on research into:
- Creator Buddy by Alex Finn
- X algorithm open-source code analysis
- 2025/2026 algorithm documentation

+function getFlowCoherence(tweets: ScoreInput[], individualScores: ScoreResult[]): number {
+  if (tweets.length < 2) return 0
+
+  let coherenceScore = 0
+  const lengths = tweets.map((t) => t.text.length)

+  else if (lengthVariance > 250) coherenceScore -= 5
+

+  if (scoreVariance < 20) coherenceScore += 10

+  const variance = scores.reduce((sum, score) => sum + Math.pow(score - avg, 2), 0) / scores.length
+  const stdDev = Math.sqrt(variance)

+  if (stdDev < 20) return 5
